short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save documents in your PocketBook while browsing, by using the Send-To-PocketBook functionality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension downloads the document available in the active tab and sends it via Send-To-PocketBook.

This extension is free of use and is not affiliated whatsoever with PocketBook official representatives.
